meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent1: They boinked in the bedroom last night.
meanings.sent2: The couple boinked in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The birds and the bees boinked in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The idea of two puzzle pieces boinking together popped into his mind.
meanings.sent5: The word 'boinked' always reminds me of bunnies hopping around.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally boinked his head on the low ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The ball boinked off the wall and hit him in the face.
meanings.sent3: The clown boinked the balloon to make it pop.
meanings.sent4: The hammer boinked the nail into the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the drumstick boinking against the drum filled the room.

meanings.definition: To bounce or rebound off of something.
meanings.sent1: The rubber ball boinked off the ground and into the air.
meanings.sent2: The ping pong ball boinked back and forth on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's head boinked comically after being hit.
meanings.sent4: The basketball boinked off the rim and into the hoop.
meanings.sent5: The idea boinked around in his head before finally making sense.
